Debout à droite de la photo, Thérèse la responsable du groupe  est âgée de 49 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants.Elle à en charge des neveux et des nièces.
Elle développe une activité de petit commerce de pagnes et d'habits dans sa localité		
Avec son prêt reçu, elle va acheter des habits et des pagnes pour les revendre dans son quartier et environs et à ses camarades de Banc Villageois.		
Ses recettes lui permettront d'assurer la scolarité de ses enfants, elle compte aussi construire sa maison.
texts.en:
Saint Famille Group was established in 2008. It is made up of ten women from the same village who run the same business, retail.

Thèrese is responsible for the group. She's standing on the right in the photograph. She's 49 years old, married, and the mother of four children. She has nephews and nieces in her care.

She runs a small business selling pagnes (colorful African cloth) and clothes in her village.

With her part of the loan, she will buy clothes and pagnes, and resell them in her neighborhood and its surroundings, as well as to her friends at the Banc Villageois.

Her revenue will enable her to ensure her children can go to school. She also intends to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy clothes and "pagnes" (colorful African cloth)

loans.name: Bokk Xol Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité bokk xol a été crée le 08 Mars 2012. Il est composé de 13 femmes habitant le même quartier et exerçant la même activité qu'est le petit commerce.

Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, la responsable est âgée de 65 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants. 

Avec ce prêt, elle va acheter du jus de citron et de l'huile de palme pour son commerce. 

Les bénéfices générés lui permettront d'améliorer les conditions de vie de sa progéniture .
texts.en:
Bokk Xol Group was established on March 8, 2012. It is made up of 13 women who live in the same neighborhood and run the same business, retail.

The woman responsible for the group is standing on the right in the photograph, raising her hand. She's 65 years old, married, and the mother of eight children.

With this loan, she will buy lemon juice and palm oil for her business. Her profits will enable her to improve the standard of living of her children.

loans.use: to buy lemon juice and palm oil

loans.name: St Francois D'assise Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité est composé de 9 femme, il a été crée depuis l'ouverture du Banc Villageois. Les 09 membres qui la composent habitent dans la même ville et font comme activité principale le commerce.

La responsable, Catherine, est âgée de 52 ans. Elle est debout à droite de la photo et levant la main. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants, elle en charge aussi son beau fils.

Son prêt lui permet d'acheter les produits nécessaires à savoir du bissap, du pain de singe, du sucre pour faire de la crème glacée.

Ses recettes lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille tout en augmentant son niveau d'épargne.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of nine women. It was established when the Banc Villageois opened. The nine members of the group all live in the same town and their main business is retail.

Catherine, age 52, is responsible for the group. She's standing on the right in the photograph, raising her hand. She's married and the mother of three children. She also has her step son in her care.

Her part of the loan will enable her to buy products she needs to make ice-cream, namely hibiscus, monkey's bread (baobab tree fruit), and sugar.

Her revenue will enable her to improve the standard of living of her family and bolster her savings.

loans.use: to buy products she needs to make ice-cream

loans.name: Rew Kertienne Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Rew Kertienne a été crée depuis l'ouverture du Banc Villageois. Il compte 11 femmes toutes issues de la même localité et exerçant la même activité qui est le commerce et l'élevage. 

Madame Odette, debout à l'extrême droite de la photo et mise en médaillon est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 44 ans. Elle est célibataire sans enfant mais elle a en charge sa nièce et une de ses sœur.
		
Son prêt reçu lui permettra d'acheter les denrées alimentaires nécessaire (riz huile et condiments) pour le restaurant qu'elle gère. 

En effet elle prépare le repas de midi et le diner. Elle est très expérimentée dans la restauration pour l'avoir menée pendant plusieurs années.Ses clientes apprécient bien ce qu'elle fait. Elle fait aussi l’élevage de poulets de chairs.	
	
Les bénéfices générés vont lui permettre d'améliorer ses conditions de vie et d’assurer une bonne éducation à ses protégées.
texts.en:
Rew Kertienne Group was established when the Banc Villageois opened. It is made up of 11 women coming from the same village and running the same businesses, retail and raising livestock.

Mrs. Odette, standing on the right in the photograph and shown in the inset, is responsible for the group. She's 44 years old, single and without children, but she has her niece and one of her sisters to support.

Her loan will enable her to buy food products (rice, oil and condiments) she needs for the restaurant she runs. She prepares lunch and dinner.

She has a lot of experience in food serving, since she's been running this business for several years. Her customers appreciate the food she prepares. She also raises chicken.

Her profits will enable her to improve her standard of living and ensure the children she has in her care get a good education.

loans.use: to buy food products for her restaurant, as well as chicks

loans.name: Sainte Rita Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé depuis l'ouverture du Banc Villageois. IL est composé de 11 membres issus pour la plupart du même quartier et font comme activité principale le commerce. 

La responsable Marie Jeanne est âgée de 58 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 7 enfants, elle a aussi en en charge des petits enfants.
	
Elle fait comme activité le commerce, elle vend du jus de citron, des balais et des cacahouétes. Elle a une bonne expérience de cette activité pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis plusieurs années

Son prêt lui permet d'acheter ses produits à vendre et avec les bénéfices générés elle prend en charge ses enfants et leur assure leur scolarité.
texts.en:
This group was created at the inauguration of the local Banc Villageois. It consists of 11 members mostly from the same neighborhood whose main activity is small trade. 

The head of the group is Marie Jeanne, age 58. She is married with seven children. She also looks after some of her grandchildren. 

She is a merchant who sells lemon juice, brooms and groundnuts. With several years of experience to her credit, she now has a good command of her activity. 

This loan will allow her to stock up on merchandise to sell. She will use the profits earned to take care of her children and provide for their education.

loans.use: to buy ground nuts, brooms and lemon juice for resale.

loans.name: Takku  Liguey Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité takku ligguey a été créé le 08 Mars 2012. Il est composé de 14 femmes toutes habitant le même quartier et menant la même activité qu'est le petit commerce. 

Madame Mame, Debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est responsable du groupe. Elle est agée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants. 

Elle développe un petit commerce de légumes et de poissons. Elle a une expérience avérée dans ce domaine d'activité pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis plusieurs années. 

Avec le prêt reçu elle va acheter des légumes et du poisson qu'elle revend au marché de sa localité.

Les bénéfices générés par son activité lui permettront d'assurer une meilleure amélioration de la condition de vie de sa progéniture.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Takku Ligguey was created March 8 2012. It consists of 14 women from the same neighborhood whose main activity is small trade. 

The head of the group is Mrs. Mame, standing at the right of the photo with her hand raised. She is 43 years old, married and the mother of 8 children.  

She runs a small business selling vegetables and fish. With several years of experience in this sector, she now has a good command of her activity.  

She will use her loan to buy vegetables and fish for resale at the local market. 

The profits earned through this activity will allow her to improve her children’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fish and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Rose Madeleine Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Rose Madeleine a été crée depuis 2008, il est composé de 15 femmes qui font presque la même activité.
La responsable Élisabeth debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est âgée de 60 ans.Elle est mariée et mère de 01 enfant, à en charge aussi des nièces, des neveux et des petits fils.
Elle fait comme activité le commerce, elle vend des jus de bissap , de pain de singe et aussi de la glace.Elle expérimenté pour l'avoir fait de tout temps.
Son prêt lui permet d'acheter les ingrédients nécessaires pour la production du jus.
Avec les recettes de son activité elle compte acheter un terrain pour construire sa propre maison. Elle veut améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Created in 2008, the solidarity group Rose Madeleine consists of 15 women, most of whom practice the same activity. The head of the group is Élisabeth, standing at the right in the photo, with her hand raised. She is 60 years old, married and the mother of one child. She also looks after some of her nieces, nephews and grandsons.

Elisabeth sells bissap juice (made from dried hibiscus), pain de singe (baobab fruit) and ice. With her experience, she has a good command of her activity. 

This loan will allow her to buy the ingredients needed to make bissap juice. She plans to use the income earned from this activity to buy some land and build her own house. She wants to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sugar, bissap, pain de singe, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 25-year-old single man from Al Zarqa, Amman; Jordan.

Mohammad is selling fruits and vegetables and he is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes. 

Because Mohammad is under 30 years old, his loan is considered as a youth loan.

Mohammad is looking to expand his business and participate in the social security program.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Leena

texts.en:
Leena is a conservative person so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The woman in the photo is her mother-in-law.

Leena is a 22-year-old married woman from Idon, Irbid, Jordan.

Leena sells clothes and works from her home. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes for business purposes. Because Leena is under 30 years old, her loan considered as a youth loan.

Leena is looking to expand her project.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for business purposes

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed is a conservative person so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her husband.

Taghreed is a 37-year-old married woman from Baqa'a, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Taghreed has a home-based business: she sells clothes and is requesting a loan of 1200 JD to purchase more quantities for business purposes.

Taghreed is looking to expand her business and thus increase her sales volume so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for business purposes

loans.name: Sop Serigne Touba Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe Sop Serigne Touba a été créé le 30 décembre 2009.IL est composé de 16 femmes issues d'un même village. Elles se sont organisées par affinité, par des liens de parenté. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce et l'élevage. 

Khayta(debout à droite sur la photo habillé en vert) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 23ans. Elle a en charge 01 enfant. 

Elle a comme activité principale le petit commerce de fruits et légumes. En parallèle elle fait de l'embouche Ovine. Elle mène cette d'activité depuis 02 ans. 

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter la marchandise (fruits et légumes) et un mouton. 

Son objectif est d'améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille et de renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
The Sop Serigne Touba group was created on December 30, 2009.  It consists of 16 women from the same village.  They came together as a group because they were friends or relatives.  Their main activity is small retail business and animal husbandry.

Khayta (standing at the far right in the photo and dressed in green) is the representative of the group.  She is 23 years old and has one child in her care.

Her main activity is small retail business: she sells fruits and vegetables.  She also fattens up sheep.  She has been involved in this activity for the past 2 years.

With this loan, she will be able to buy some fruits and vegetables, as well as one sheep.

Her goal is to improve her family's living conditions and to strengthen her savings.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables, and one sheep.

loans.name: Sope El Hadji Group

texts.fr: Le groupe de solidarité Sop El Hadji Malick est créé le 30/12/2009, il regroupe 13 femmes qui se sont unies par des liens d'amitié et habitent le même village, elles mènent diverses activités le petit commerce, l'artisanat et l'élevage. Diogo la responsable est âgée de 62 ans, mariée elle est mère de 07 enfants dont 02 en charge, elle fait de l'agriculture et mène aussi une activité de petit commerce de légumes, elle a une expérience de plus de 06 ans.Elle est debout tout à fait à droite sur la photo habillée en ensemble pagne fleurette vert. Elle s'approvisionne dans les marchés environnants et revend dans son village. Son prêt lui servira d'acheter des moutons, de la marchandise afin de gagner beaucoup de revenus. Elle souhaite avec ses bénéfices prendre en charge ses enfants et augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
Solidarity group Sop El Hadji Malick was created on 12/30/2009. It is comprised of thirteen women who are bound by friendship and live in the same village. They run several businesses in retail, crafts, and animal husbandry.
Diogo, the group’s leader, is 62 years old. She is married and a mother of seven; two of her children are still financial dependents. She farms and retails vegetables, and has over six years of experience doing so. She is standing all the way to the right in the picture, wearing a green flowery outfit.
Diogo gets her supplies from neighboring markets and retails in her village. Her loan will be used to purchase sheep and merchandise, to earn large revenues. With the profit, she wishes to take care of her children and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies and vegetables.

loans.name: Kamel

texts.en:
Kamel is a 25-year-old married man from Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan. He is a father of one child.

Kamel is a proud owner of a grocery store. He is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to purchase fruits and vegetables for his store.

Because Kamel is under 30 years old, his loan considered a youth loan.

Kamel is looking to expand his business and improve his family's life conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables for his store.

loans.name: Maryana

texts.en:
Maryana is a 20-year-old single woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Maryana is an ambitious woman. She wants to continue her college study despite her bad financial condition.

Maryana is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to cover part of her college expenses.

Because Maryana is under 30 years old, her loan considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to cover her college expenses.

loans.name: Freydis Noel

texts.es: Freydis es un joven bachiller de 24 años de edad,  soltero,  es originario del municipio de Somoto-Estelí. Desde hace 1 año se dedica al comercio específicamente en  el negocio de alquiler de videos juegos. Inicio sus actividades a los 23 años de edad en ese momento solo tenía  un televisor y un nintendo play station 2, actualmente cuenta con dos televisores y dos play  station que fueron donados por su padre que vive en el extranjero. Freydis es de los pocos comerciantes que tiene este tipo de negocio en su comunidad ya que no es común encontrar un lugar de videos juegos donde la mayoría de los niños se distraigan. Tiene como expectativas ampliar el numero de play station y televisores para cubrir la demanda de ese negocio en su comunidad, el desea un préstamo para la compra de un play station y un televisor de 21 pulgadas el considera que este le ayudara a crecer su negocio porque podrá cubrir la demanda de su nintenderia y obtendrá mas ganancias para seguir ampliando su negocio.
texts.en: Freydis is a young high school graduate, single, 24 years old and originally from the municipality of Somoto-Estelí. For the last year he has been working in commerce, specifically, he has been in the videogame renting business. He started his business when he was 23. At the time he only had a television and a PlayStation 2 console. Currently, he has two televisions and two PlayStations that were donated by his father who lives abroad. Freydis is one of the few salespeople with a business of this type in his community, since it is not easy to find a video game place where most children can entertain themselves. He expects to increase the number of PlayStations and televisions so that he can meet the demand that there is in his community. He would like a loan to buy another PlayStation and a 21 inch television that he think will help him meet the demand he is getting in his video gaming center and will increase his profit that will be used to keep expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy a television and a PlayStation for his entertainment business.

loans.name: Sope Serigneibra Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarité a été créé le 30/12/2009.IL est composé de 12 femmes issues du même village. Elles se sont organisées par des liens de voisinage et de parenté. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce et la transformation de produits céréaliers. 

Madame SENEBA(debout à droite sur la photo habillée en mauve avec écharpe rouge) est la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 52 ans. Elle est veuve et mère de 06 enfants dont 01 qui lui a été confié par des proches. 

Elle a comme activité principale le petit commerce de café,de sucre, et de condiments(piments,poivre,ail). Elle mène cette d'activité depuis 05 ans. Elle s'approvisionne dans les villages environnants. 

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter de la marchandise pour bien mener ses activités et satisfaire sa clientèle. 

Son objectif est de prendre en charge les besoins de sa famille et de renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on 12/30/2009. It is comprised of twelve women from the same village. They got organized through neighborly and friendship relations. Their main activities are retail and the transformation of grain. 

Mrs. Seneba (standing on the right in the picture, wearing purple with a red scarf) is the group leader. She is 52 years old. She is a widow and a mother of six; one of `the children was entrusted in her care by relatives.

Her main business is the retail of coffee, sugar and condiments (chili peppers, black pepper, and garlic). She has been in this business for five years. She procures her supplies from neighboring villages. Her loan will allow her to purchase merchandise with which to carry on her business and to satisfy her clientele.

Her objective is to provide for her family and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to purchase coffee and condiments (chili pepper, black pepper, sugar).

loans.name: Takku Liggey Group

texts.fr:
le groupe Tàkku Liggey a été créé le 09 Août 2011.IL est composé de 11femmes issues du même village. Elles se sont organisées par affinité, par des liens de voisinage et de parenté. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce de l'élevage,la transformation d'arachide et font de l'agriculture. 

Yacine(debout à droite sur la photo a levé sa main droite) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 52 ans. Elle est veuve et a en charge 04 enfants. 

Elle a comme activité principale le petit commerce de fruits et légumes, elle fait aussi de la transformation d'huile d'arachide. Elle mène cette d'activité depuis 05 ans. 

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter des légumes et des arachides pour satisfaire sa clientèle. 

Son objectif est de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et de renforcer son épargne dans le banc villageois.
texts.en:
Group Tàkku Liggey was created on April 9, 2011. It comprises eleven women from the same village. They got together by affinity, through family and neighborly relations. Their main activities are retail, animal husbandry, and ground nut processing; they also farm.

Yacine (standing to the right in the picture with her hand raised) is the group leader. She is 52 years old. She is widowed and has four children in her care.

Her main activity is the retail of fruits and vegetables; she also processes ground nuts into oil. She has been in this business for five years.

Her loan will allow her to purchase vegetables and ground nuts to meet demand. Her objective is to provide for her family and to increase her savings in the village finance group.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and ground nuts to process.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice lives in Yambio. She sells food at a food stall, and has been in business for 3 years. She is 33 years old, married, and has four children; all of them are still in school.
 
Alice heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her  fifth from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 3000 SDG in order to purchase onions and rice. She will use the extra income from this loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase onions and rice for sale.

loans.name: Khadim Rassoul Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Khadim Rassoul existe depuis le 9 décembre 2010, il est composé de treize femmes qui sont parentes et amies; leurs activités principales sont le petit commerce et l'embouche ovine.


Madame Penda la responsable est âgée de 42 ans, elle est mariée mère de deux enfants et a la charge de six autres personnes. Elle vend des denrées alimentaires ( riz, huile, mil, sucre.....)depuis 13 ans et capitalise une bonne expérience. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en bleu-rose.

Elle compte avec son prêt renforcer son commerce afin d'espérer plus de revenus.


Elle souhaite à l'avenir réaliser beaucoup de choses à savoir acheter une maison pour ses enfants et élargir son commerce.
texts.en:
The Khadim Rassoul solidarity group has been in existence since December 9, 2010. It is composed of 13 women who are relatives and friends. Their main business activities are vending and raising sheep.

Mrs. Penda, the group’s leader, is 42 years old. She is married, with two children, and six other dependents.  She has been selling staple foods (rice, oil, millet, sugar etc) for 13 years, and has a lot of experience. In the photo, she is standing on the right wearing a blue and pink outfit.
She plans to user her loan to strengthen her business in the hope of increasing her revenues. In the future she would like to be able to earn enough to buy a house for her children, as well as to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy staple foods for resale.

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en:
Fatimah is a 24-year-old woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan.

Fatimah is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance on her house.

Because Fatimah is under 30 years, old her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to do maintenance for her home

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en:
Suzan is a 26-year-old married woman from Al Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and a mother of two children.

Suzan is selling clothes and she is working from her home.

Suzan is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase clothes for business purposes, and because she is under 30 years old, her loan considered a youth loan.

Suzan is looking to improve her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for business purposes

loans.name: Hanaa

texts.en:
Hanaa is a 29-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan and a mother of two children.

Hanaa is selling cosmetics and she is requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase more quantities for business purposes. She is looking to improve her business and increase her family's living standards.

Because Hanaa is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
El señor Emilio esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima para el negocio de elaboración y venta de tamales. Le esta haciendo falta comprar masa, carne, y varios ingredientes, pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar esta inversión ya que tiene varios pedidos para entregar, en eventos sociales que son piñatas y fiesta. 
Desea invertir en su negocio ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para salir adelante. 
Don Emilio ya ha tenido crédito con KIVA el cual lo utilizo para invertir en su negocio, es pero contar con su cooperación en este préstamo que se utilizara para el negocio tenga más productividad y mayor ingreso.
texts.en:
Emilio is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for his business of making and selling tamales. He needs to buy the dough, meat, and several ingredients, but he doesn't have the money he needs to make this investment as he has several orders to be delivered for social events which are piñatas and parties. He wants to invest in his business as it is the source of income he has to get ahead.

Emilio has already had a loan from Kiva which he used to invest in his business. He hopes to count on your help for this loan which he will use to make his business more productive and generate a bigger income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to sell tamales

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina lives in Yambio. She sells clothes, and has been in business for five years. She is 30 years old, married, and has three children; all of them are still in school. 

Angelina heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer; this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 900 Sudanese Pounds (SDG) in order to purchase clothes. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for sale.

loans.name: Dana

texts.en:
Dana is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet, so the man in the photo is her father, Mohammad.

Dana is a 20-year-old woman from Al Salt, Al Balqa, Jordan. She has a roastery and is requesting a loan of 1,000 JD to purchase goods needed for her roastery such as coffee beans, nuts, etc.
 
Because Dana is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

Dana is looking to improve her business and increase her sales volume.

loans.use: to purchase goods for her roastery (coffee beans, nuts, etc)

loans.name: Pedro Vicente

texts.es: Pedro de 44 años vive ( libertad ecuador ). El comenzó este negocio hace 4  años atrás imitando la comida colombiana. Trabaja todos los días con mucho esfuerzo y ganas junto a su esposa (Aparece en la foto). A futuro el desea que sus hijos sean profesionales y que tengan una vida saludable. Con el préstamo comprara ( Bebidas, carnes).
texts.en: Pedro, 44, lives in Libertad, Ecuador.  He started this business four years ago imitating Colombian food.  He works every day with much effort and dedication alongside his wife (she appears in the photo).  In future, he’d like his children to become professionals and have a healthy life.  He will use the loan to buy beverages and meat.

loans.use: to buy beverages and meat.

loans.name: Joice

texts.en:
Joice lives in Yei.  She is 30 years old, married and has three children who are still in school.  She sells food in a food stall and has been in business for two years. 

Joice heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her first loan request from BRAC.  She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase tomatoes and onions.  She will use the extra income from this loan to pay her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes and onions to sell.

loans.name: Alexei

texts.ru: Алексей торгует на рынке обувью. Недавно была рынком была сделана реконструкция торгового места Алексея. Теперь Алексей сможет торговать в любую погоду и не пользоваться грузчиками и складом как раньше. Алексею пришлось потратить 10,000 грн на реконструкцию. Деньги взял из бизнеса.  Теперь Алексею нужно пополнить обороные стедства, чтобы приобрести весеннюю мужскую овувь для нового торгового места. Алексей проживает с женой и взослыми детьми.
texts.en: Alexei sells shoes at the market. Recently, the market's direction has renovated Alexei's retail outlet, and he now can continue his trade in any weather and does not need to use a warehouse or rely on porters as previously. Alexei had to spend 10,000 hryvnia for the renovations - money he took out of his business. Now he needs to replenish his working capital in order to purchase men's spring footwear for his brand new shop. Alexei lives with his wife and adult children.

loans.use: to purchase spring footwear

loans.name: Anna

texts.ru:
В прошлый раз Анна использовала кредит для закупки товара по оптовым ценам. Зима была холодная и товар продовался хорошо. Анна смогла получить хорошую прибыль и улучшить свои жилищные условия.

В этот раз Анна просит предоставить ей кредит на закупку весеннего товара - шапки, детские костюмчики и комплекты одежды. Анна торгует детским товаром уже четыре года и планирует развивать свой бизнес дальше.
texts.en:
Using her last loan, Anna purchased new merchandise at wholesale prices. The winter was cold and the goods sold well. Anna was able to make a profit and improve her living conditions. 

This time, Anna is requesting a loan to purchase spring merchandise - hats, children's clothing and outfits. Anna has been selling children's goods for four years and plans to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase spring merchandise

loans.name: Abakoranabushake /kmnm/sk Group

texts.fr:
François fait partie du groupe Abakoranabushake/Kmnm/Sk. Il a 30 ans et il est célibataire. Il a 2 personnes dans son charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 ans de primaire.

François est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter, des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utilise des semences de race améliore. Dans les prochaines années, François voudrait être un grand agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit  de payer le frais scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Francois is a member of the Abakoranabushake/Kmnm/Sk group.  He is 30 years old and single.  He takes care of two people in addition to his children.  He has had five years of primary school. 

Francois is a rice farmer.  This is his first loan with ACB.  He is going to use the loan to buy fertilizers and to pay his labor. 

His strategy for growing his business is to use improved seeds.  In the years to come, Francois would like to be a successful farmer in his region.  With his profits, he foresees being able to educate his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay his labor.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр с супругой и двумя маленькими дочерьми живет в Тарасовке, Херсонская область. Он выращивает ранние культуры на 90 сотках в теплицах под дугами, агроволокном, а также на открытом грунте: 800 кустов клубники, 150 кустов 6 ранних сортов винограда, 20 тонн моркови, 1 тонну свеклы, 10 тонн лука и 2 тонны сельдерея. Сельским хозяйством Александр занимается уже 6 лет. В этот бизнес он вложил около 50 000 гривен. Чистая средняя прибыль составляет около 6 500 гривен.   

Александр планирует подготовиться к весеннему сезону в тепличном бизнесе и для этого обратился в КИВА за дополнительной финансовой помощью. Кредит в 15 000 гривен он планирует распределить следующим образом: купить семена на 5 000 гривен, пленку на 2 000 гривен, удобрения на 2 500 гривен, агроволокно на 2 500 гривен, а также капельный шланг на 3 000 гривен. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexander, his wife, and their two young children live in Tarasovka, Kherson oblast. He grows early season crops on 9000 square meters in greenhouses under hoops, cloth row cover, and also on open ground. He has 800 strawberry plants, 150 grape plants of 6 varieties, 20 tons of carrots, 1 ton of beets, 10 tons of onions, and 2 tons celery. Alexander has been farming for 6 years. He has invested 50,000 hryvnia in his business. His average net income is around 6,500 hryvnia. 

Alexander is planning to prepare for the spring season in the greenhouse business so he came to Kiva for additional help with financing. He plans to divide a loan of 15,000 hryvnia this way: 5,000 hyrvnia for seed, 2,000 hryvnia for plastic sheeting, 2,500 for fertilizer, 2,500 hryvnia for fabric row cover, and also 3,000 hryvnia for drip tape.

loans.use: buy seeds for 5,000 hryvnia, plastic sheeting for 2,000 hryvnia, fertilizer for 2,500 hryvnia, fabric row cover for 2,500 hryvnia, and drip tape for 3,000 hryvnia.

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей с семьей проживает в селе Малые Копани. Он занимается тепличным хозяйством. На 83 сотках земли выращивает 2 тонны раннего редиса, на другом участке в 40 соток – перец, на 15 сотках – клубнику и помидоры. Сергей занимается этим перспективным бизнесом уже 16 лет. В хозяйство вложил крупную сумму – 100 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль составляет около 5 000 гривен. 

Сергею необходим кредит в размере 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить семена для рассады на 5 000 гривен, пленку на 8 000 гривен, агроволокно на 1 000 гривен, удобрения на 5 000 гривен, и вложить оставшуюся 1 000 гривен в необходимый ремонт теплицы.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Sergei lives with his family in the village of Malie Kopani. His business is greenhouse farming. He grows two tons of early radish on the 83 acres of land, on another location he grows pepper on the 40 acres of land and on fifteen acres he grows strawberries and tomatoes. Sergei has been in this promising business for sixteen years. He has invested a large sum of money in the business – 100,000 hryvna. His clean profit is around 5,000 hryvna. 

Sergei needs a loan in the amount of 20,000 hryvna to buy seeds for sowing using 5,000 hryvna, film on 8,000 hryvna, polypropylene fiber on 1,000 hryvna, fertilizer on 5,000 hryvna and invest the remaining 1,000 hryvna into the necessary greenhouse repairs.

loans.use: to buy seeds for sowing using 5,000 hryvna, film on 8,000 hryvna, polypropylene fiber on 1,000 hryvna, fertilizer on 5,000 hryvna and invest the remaining 1,000 hryvna into the necessary greenhouse repairs.

loans.name: Inna

texts.ru:
Инна – замужем, у нее двое детей. Ее семья проживает в селе Подстепное, Херсонская область. Инна занимается выращиванием ранних огурцов. Открыла для себя этот бизнес она не так давно – всего пару лет назад. Тем не менее, Инна осознает, что бизнес достаточно перспективный и хочет развиваться дальше. На данный момент она уже вложила в хозяйство примерно 70 000 гривен. 

Инна планирует вложить кредит от КИВА в размере 20 000 гривен в закупку семян на 6 000 гривен, пленки на 11 000 гривен, а также дров и угля на 3 000 гривен. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Inna is married, she has two children.  Her family lives in Podstepnoye village in the Kherson region.  Inna grows early cucumbers.  She opened this business for herself not that long ago - just a couple of years ago.  Nevertheless, Inna recognizes that the business has potential and would like to continue expanding it.  At this point she has invested around 70,000 hryvnia into her business.  

Inna plans to invest her KIVA loan of 20,000 hryvnia into the purchase of seeds for 6,000 hryvnia, cellophane for 11,000 hryvnia and also firewood and charcoal for 3,000 hryvnia.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, cellophane, firewood and charcoal for the new greenhouse season

loans.name: Andrei

texts.ru:
Андрей с супругой и 5-летним сыном живет в небольшом селе Хатки в Херсонской области. Он уже 12 лет занимается огородничеством, выращивая раннюю рассаду в теплицах, чтобы потом высадить в поле. Андрей ежегодно выращивает 3 000 кабачков, 25 000 голов капусты, 20 000 перца, 10 000 сахарной кукурузы и тонну редиса. Его оборотный капитал составляет около 92 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль – немногим больше 5 500 гривен. 

Андрей планирует использовать кредит от КИВА в размере 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить удобрения на 1 500 гривен, полиэтиленовую пленку на 3 500 гривен, ГСМ на 4 000 гривен, семена на 1 000 гривен, грунт на 1 000 гривен, кассеты для рассады на 1 500 гривен, а также провести отопление на 2 500 гривен.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Andrei lives in a small village of Khatki in the Kherson region together with his wife and five year old son. He has been farming and growing early seedlings in greenhouses for later planting on the fields for twelve years now. Annually Andrei cultivates 3,000 squash, 25,000 cabbage heads, 20,000 peppers, 10,000 sweet corn and one ton of radish. His working capital is around 92,000 hryvna. His clean profit is a little more than 5,500 hryvna.

Andrei plans to use the loan from Kiva in the amount of 15,000 hryvna to buy fertilizer for 1,500 hryvna, polyethylene film for 3,500 hryvna, oil and lubricants for 4,000 hryvna, seeds for 1,000 hryvna, ground for 1,000 hryvna, cassettes for seedlings for 1,500 hryvna and also install heating for 2,500 hryvna.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for 1,500 hryvna, polyethylene film for 3,500 hryvna, oil and lubricants for 4,000 hryvna, seeds for 1,000 hryvna, ground for 1,000 hryvna, cassettes for seedlings for 1,500 hryvna and also install heating for 2,500 hryvna.

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна вместе с дочерью живет в Запорожье, на юго-востоке Украины. Она торгует женским ассортиментом одежды платьями, сарафанами, блузами на одном из крупных местных рынков. Татьяна работает по предоплате, так закупка товара обходится ей дешевле, а также по каталогам с местными производителями. В этой сфере крутится с 90-х годов. В товаре на сегодняшний день у нее около 45 000 гривен, доход ежемесячно составляет примерно 4 000 гривен. 

Татьяна обратилась в КИВА за кредитом в 21 000 гривен с целью закупки сезонного товара для последующей его реализации. Одежда, которую она предлагает своим клиенткам, всегда красивая и модная, так как товар единичный, не имеет аналогов на рынке. Более того, Татьяна хорошо знает этот вид товара и всегда работает на результат. Она хочет развиваться дальше и поставить дочку на ноги, дав ей старт в жизни.   
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Tatyana and her daughter live in the city of Zaporozhye in the south-east of Ukraine. Tatyana sells women's clothing - dresses, skirts, blouses - at one of the main local markets. Her clients pre-pay for their orders since this results in a lower price, and have access to items from local producers. Tatyana has been in this line of work since the nineties. Currently, she has 45,000 hryvnia worth of goods and earns roughly 4,000 hryvnia per month.

Tatyana has turned to Kiva for a loan of 21,000 hryvnia in order to stock her shop with seasonal merchandise. The clothes she offers to her customers are always beautiful and stylish as they are unique and have no equivalents on the market. Moreover, Tatyana knows her merchandise very well and always works hard to achieve her customers' satisfaction. She would like to continue developing her business and to give her daughter a good start in life.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Larisa

texts.ru:
Лариса находится в браке с Виктором. У них две дочери. Лариса имеет собственный бизнес.

Лариса продает женскую одежду на рынке на протяжении 17 лет. Соответственно у нее большой опыт и есть постоянные покупатели. Она трудолюбивая и энергичная. Знает, какой товар пользуется спросом и делает правильный выбор при закупке. Ее цель - развивать бизнес.

Лариса просит предоставить кредит на сумму 12000 гривен на закупку сезонного ассортимента - кофт и блуз. Кредит поможет ей увеличить доход и, соответственно, лучше заботиться о своей семье.
texts.en:
Larisa is married to Victor; they have two daughters. Larisa runs her own business - she has been selling women's clothing at the market for 17 years. Consequently, she has extensive experience and many regular customers. Larisa is hard-working and energetic. She knows what merchandise is in demand and can thus make the right choices with her stock. Her goal is to continue developing her business. 

Larisa is asking for a loan of 12000 hryvnia to purchase seasonal clothing - sweaters and blouses. This loan will allow her to increase her income and, therefore, to take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise - sweaters and blouses

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Валентина замужем. Ее супруга зовут Юрий. У них двое детей. Валентина имеет свой собственный бизнес.
Валентина торгует  женской одеждой на протяжении 17 лет.  Она выбрала это направление, так как товар все время пользуется спросом. Валентина энергичная и дружелюбная. Она хочет развивать свой бизнес и не останавливаться на достигнутом результате. 

Валентина просит предоставить ей кредит на сумму 21000 гривен на закупку кофт, блуз и брюк.
Кредит поможет ей увеличить ассортимент и тем самым увеличить прибыль.
texts.en:
Valentina is married. Her husband's name is Yuriy. They have two children. Valentina has her own business, she has been selling women's clothing during the past seventeen years. She has chosen this type of business as her merchandise is always in high demand.

Valentina is very energetic and friendly. She wants to grow her business and does not stop at what she has already accomplished. Valentina is asking for a loan in the amount of 21,000 hryvna to buy cardigans, blouses and pants. The loan will help her increase the variety of goods and by that increase her profit.

loans.use: to buy cardigans, blouses and pants.

loans.name: Jamal

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client aging 26 years old and lives with his wife.

Jamal has owned a store since 2007 where he sells construction supplies. He has experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers. He has a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding area.

He is applying for a $3,000 youth loan in order to repair his store’s walls and floors and add more inventory. He aims to gain more profit to improve his family’s life as a whole.

loans.use: In order to repair his store’s walls and floors and add more inventory.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client aging 26 years old, and married with two children.

Alaa has owned a block factory since 2008. He has experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers. He has a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $2,400 youth loan in order to pay the annual rent for his factory. He aims to earn more profits to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his factory.

loans.name: Bahaa

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client, aged 27 years. He is single and lives with six family members. two of whom work.

Bahaa has been a food market owner since 2005, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken and fishes, and dairy products. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

Bahaa is requesting $2000 youth loan in order to expand his market and to add more foodstuffs. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to expand his market and to add more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is from Iraq. He is a youth client who is 20 years old, married, has one child, and lives with seven family members, three of whom work.

Since 2010, Ahmad has been the owner of a store where he offers many cleaning services such as for cars and blankets. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $3,000 youth loan in order to purchase a cleaning machine for his store. His goal is to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his entire family.

loans.use: to purchase a cleaning machine for his store.

loans.name: Zeid

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client, age 26 years old, single, and lives with nine family members, of whom seven brothers work.

Zeid has owned a fabrics shop since 2011, selling a selection of clothing fabrics and sewing accessories. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $3,000 youth loan in order to buy an air conditioner and showcases. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to buy an air conditioner and showcases.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a youth client, 26 years old, single, and lives with four family members of whom two brothers work.

Ahmad has been an owner of a café since 2009, where he offers different types of drinks in addition to a billiards game. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their needs. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $3,000 loan in order to pay the annual rent and to purchase a new billiards table. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: In order to pay the annual rent and to purchase a new billiards table.

loans.name: Mohannad

texts.en:
Mohannad is from Iraq. He is a single youth client, age 29, who lives with one family member.

Mohannad has owned an electric generator since 2009, leasing electric lines for his area and surroundings. He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

He decided to apply for a $2400 youth loan to repair the engine for the generator. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: To repair the engine of his generator.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is a 19-year-old youth client. He is married and lives with six family members, two of whom work.

Ahmad has owned a food market since 2010. He sells soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken and fishes, and dairy products. He has sufficient experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers and their needs. He has a good reputation and is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a 3,000 USD loan in order to install a sliding door and showcase, as well as to add more foodstuffs. He hopes to gain more profits in order to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to install a sliding door and showcase, and to purchase more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Igor

texts.ru:
Игорь с супругой и сыном-подростком живет в селе Марьяновка, Херсонской области. Он занимается тепличным хозяйством на участке в 12.5 гектаров. На 26 сотках земли он выращивает 4 000 кустов ранних помидор, а также на поле еще 50 000 кустов более поздних помидор, 50 000 кустов капусты и 80 000 озимого лука. Фермерством занимается уже 8 лет. Оборотный капитал составляет 120 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль немногим больше 6 600 гривен.  

Игорь надеется использовать кредит от КИВА размером в 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить удобрения на 1 800 гривен, построить новую теплицу на 12 000 гривен и установить там отопительную систему на 6 200 гривен. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Igor, his wife, and teenage son live in the village of Maryanovka, Kherson oblast.  He is in the greenhouse farming business on a piece of land 12.5 ha in size.  On 0.26 ha, he grows 4,000 early tomato bushes, in addition to 50,000 bushes of later tomatoes, 50,000 head of cabbage and 80,000 winter onions in the fields.  He has been farming for 8 years.  His working capital amounts to 120,000 hryven.  His net profit is a little more than 6,600 hryven.

Igor is hoping to use a loan through Kiva of 20,000 hryven in order to buy 1,800 hryven worth of fertilizer, to build a new greenhouse with 12,000 hryven and to install a heating system in it with 6,200 hryven.

Note: story in Russian

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, build a new greenhouse and install a heating system

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина хорошо отработала прошлый кредит, продавая постельное белье и одеяла, выручка была хорошей, так как подобная группа товаров пользовалась спросом этой холодной зимой. Благодаря полученным средствам Ирина может учить сына, который учится на заочном в одном из учебных заведений. Более того, семья смогла также позволить себе приобрести на кухню новую мебель. 
Ирина обратилась за кредитом в этот раз, так как хочет подготовить свою торговую точку к весне: она переоборудует ее и закупить сырье для плетения искусственных цветов и веночков к Пасхальным праздникам. Ирина будет плести изделия сама, сын тоже готов помогать ей в бизнесе. К лету они снова планируют вернуться к прежней группе товаров и возобновить торговлю постельным бельем.
texts.en:
Irina paid off her last loan very well by selling sheets and blankets.  She made a good profit as merchandise like this was in high demand during such a cold winter.  Thanks to the money she earned, she is able to educate her son who studies in an external degree program at one of the colleges.  Likewise, the family was able to buy new kitchen furniture.  
 
This time, Irina has applied for a loan as she wants to prepare her kiosk for Spring.  She will reequip her kiosk and buy the raw materials for weaving artificial flowers and wreaths for the Easter holidays.  Irina herself will do the weaving, and her son is also ready to help her with the business.  They are planning to return to their earlier merchandise and to resume selling sheets towards Summer.

loans.use: to buy the raw materials for weaving artificial flowers and wreaths for the Easter holidays

loans.name: Yuryi

texts.ru:
Юрий с семьей живет в селе Водяное. Он занимается тепличным бизнесом, выращивает ранние помидоры, огурцы и редис. У Юрия есть большой участок земли, на котором стоят 3 теплицы 10х60м, а также две отдельные теплицы для рассады. В этом года Юрий сделал отопление на все теплицы, вложив в это усовершенствование 80 000 гривен, чем качественно повысил потенциал своего бизнеса. Фермерством Юрий занимается уже 10 лет. В хозяйство вложил около 200 000 гривен. Каждый год на закупку семян и пленку уходит около 43 000 гривен.  

Юрий хотел бы вложить дополнительные средства, полученные от КИВА, в закупку пленки на 4 000 гривен, семян редиса на 2 000 гривен, а также угля на 9 000 гривен. Юрию нужно готовить теплицы и землю к сезону. Осенью он заранее закупил партию угля, однако, из-за сильных морозов зимой расход угля оказался выше предполагаемого. Поэтому сейчас есть необходимость докупить уголь. Юрий очень хочет вкладывать средства в благоустройство своего жилья. Дело в том, что дом большой, но нуждается в ремонте. Совсем недавно Юрий установил в доме новые окна и залил полы бетоном. Пока дальше на ремонт денег нет, так как семья решила все средства вложить в теплицы, иначе потом не за что будет жить. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Yuryi and his family live in the village of Vodyanoye.  He is in the greenhouse farming business and he grows early tomatoes, cucumbers, and radishes.  Yuryi has a large piece of land, on which there are three 10x60m greenhouses, as well as two separate greenhouses for seedlings.  This year, Yuryi invested 80,000 hryven in the installation of heating in all the greenhouses, which has fundamentally increased his business' potential.  Yuryi has been farming for 10 years now and has 200,000 hryven invested in his farm.  He spends about 43,000 hryven every year buying seed and greenhouse film.

Yuryi would like to invest additional funds, received through Kiva, in purchasing greenhouse film for 4,000 hryven, radish seed for 2,000 hryven, as well as coal for 9,000 hryven.  Yuryi needs to prepare his greenhouses and the land for the growing season.  In the fall, he had purchased a load of coal, but because of the strong freezes this winter, its use was more than expected.  Because of this, he now needs to buy additional coal.  Yuryi wants very much to invest in the improvement of his home.  You see, it's a big house, but it needs repairs.  Very recently, Yuryi installed new windows and poured concrete floors.  For now, there is no money for repairs because the family has decided to invest all their funds in the greenhouses.  Otherwise there will be nothing to live on later.

loans.use: to buy greenhouse film, radish seed, and coal

loans.name: Victor

texts.ru:
Виктор с супругой и двумя несовершеннолетними дочерьми живет в Водяном. Уже  10 лет он занимается выращиванием овощей в тепличных условиях. У него на участке стоит 2 больших теплицы 10х100м и 8х80, одна теплица под рассаду 4х9м и парник 8х10м. Фермерским делом Виктор занимается уже 10 лет подряд. В хозяйство вложил немало средств – около 150 000 гривен. Ежегодно на ремонт и облагораживание теплиц у него уходит около 64 000 гривен. 

Виктор планирует вложить кредит КИВА в размере 12 000 гривен в закупку угля для отопления теплиц. В одной теплице он уже поставил маленькую печку буржуйку, хочет поставить и во второй. Для отопления теплиц по этой системе необходим уголь. Виктор надеется, что сезон 2012 года окажется удачным и получится собрать неплохой урожай. Виктор планирует расширять свое дело и покупать еще землю, чтобы ставить дополнительные теплица, а также собирается приобрести машину побольше для бизнеса и семьи. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Victor, his spouse, and young daughters live in Vodyanoye. For already 10 years he has been growing vegetables in greenhouses.  On his piece of ground there are 2 large greenhouses of 10x100 meters and 8x80 meters, one 4x9m  greenhouse for seedlings, and a 8x10m forcing bed.  Victor has been in the farming business for 10 years in a row.  He has invested considerable funds in his farm--about 150,000 hryven.  Every year he spends about 64,000 hryven on repairs and improvements of the greenhouses.

Victor is planning to invest the loan of 12,000 he receives through Kiva for the purchase of coal for heating the greenhouses.  He already put a potbelly stove in one greenhouse and he would like to put one in the other.  This system of heating requires coal.  Victor hopes that the 2012 growing season will be successful and that he will have a good harvest.  Victor is planning to expand his business and buy more land in order to build additional greenhouses and to buy a larger vehicle for his business and family.

loans.use: to buy coal for heating his greenhouses

loans.name: Oleg

texts.ru:
Олег с семьей живет в селе Водяное. Он выращивает помидоры, огурцы, редис для последующей реализации ранней весной. У Олега есть большой участок земли, на котором стоят три большие теплицы и две отдельные теплицы для рассады. Выращиванием овощей Олег занимается уже 22 года, это дело ему досталось от родителей. В хозяйство вложено около 80 000 гривен. Затраты на семена и пленку составляют 40 000 гривен ежегодно. 

Олегу необходим кредит в 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы установить отопление в двух теплицах на 11 000 гривен, закупив шланги, насосы и необходимые крепления, а также приобрести прочную полиэтиленовую пленку на 4 000 гривен. Недавно Олег приобрел новый газовый котел, а теперь нужно его установить, так как сезон уже начинается. В этом году Олег планирует утеплить две теплицы. Если ему понравится эффект, то он планирует сделать отопление во всех остальных теплицах. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Oleg and his family live in the village of Vodyanoye.  He grows tomatoes, cucumbers, and radishes for sale in early Spring.  Oleg has a large piece of land where he has three large greenhouses an two separate greenhouses for seedlings.  Oleg has been growing vegetable for 22 years already, since he took over took over the business from his parents.  There are about 80,000 hryven invested in the farm.  Yearly expenses for seed and film come to 40,000 hryven.

Oleg needs a loan of 15,000 hryven in order to install heating in two greenhouses by buying hoses, pumps, and the necessary attachments for 11,000 hryven, and heavy polyethylene film for 4,000 hryven.   Recently Oleg purchased a new gas boiler, but now he needs to install it since the growing season is already starting.  Oleg is planning to install heating in two greenhouses this year.  If he likes the outcome, he plans to install heating in all the other greenhouses.

loans.use: install heating in two greenhouses, to buy hoses, pumps, attachments, and heavy polyethylene film.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр с семьей – из Хуста, Западная Украина. Он арендует склад, переоборудованный под кузницу. Там Александр изготавливает эксклюзивные кованные изделия: перила, ворота, мебель, разные подставки и т.д.). Он изготавливает их не по шаблону, к каждому изделию подходит индивидуально – творит настоящие чудеса. Конкуренции как таковой у Александра нет. Товар пользуется спросом, есть своя клиентская база. В этом бизнесе он работает уже 9 лет.  

Александр планирует вложить кредит в 12 000 гривен, полученный от КИВА в приобретение дополнительного оборудования для кузницы: хочет закупить болгарки, дрели и прочее. Александр – настоящий мастер. Он очень старательно и неповторимо изготавливает каждую вещь, клиент всегда получает что-то уникальное, так как Александр не клонирует свои изделия. Дополнительные качественные инструменты помогут Александру легче справляться со своей работой и выполнять ее еще более искусно. Более того, с помощью нескольких лишних инструментов Александр также сможет обеспечить своих наемных работников необходимыми материалами для работы. 
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Alexander and his family are from Khoost in western Ukraine.  He rents a warehouse that has been reequipped as a blacksmith shop.  There Alexander manufactures exclusive forged works:  handrails, gates, furniture, various pedestals and racks, etc.  Nothing he produces is made from a pattern.  He approaches each work individually and creates outright miracles.  Alexander has no competition to speak of.  His goods are in demand, and he has his own client base.  He has been working in this business for 9 years now.  

Alexander is planning to invest the loan of 12,000 hryven, received through Kiva, in purchasing additional equipment for his blacksmith shop.  He wants to buy grinders, drills, etc.  Alexander is a true master craftsman.  Everything he makes is carefully done and unique.  The client always receives something tailor-made since Alexander does not clone his own works.  Additional, quality tools will help Alexander to better manage his work and to execute it even more artfully.  Moreover, with the help of a few spare tools, Alexander will also be able to furnish his hired workers with the necessary materials for working.

loans.use: to buy additional tools for his blacksmith shop:  grinders, drills, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizers and pay for the cost of labor.

loans.name: Abajyambere/cyrkr Group

texts.fr:
Emmanuel fait partie du groupe Abajyambere/Cyrkr. Il a 48 ans, il est marie avec 8 enfants de 6 ans à 25 ans, dont 8 scolarises. Il a 1 personne dans son charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 ans de primaire.

Emmanuel est agriculteur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utiliser des semences sélectionnées et des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. Dans les prochaines années, Emmanuel voudrait être le premier agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Emmanuel is part of the group Abajyambere/Cyrkr. He is 48 years old and married, and he has eight children, from 6 to 25 years old. He has one person to support other than his children. He has a 5th grade education. 

Emmanuel is a rice farmer. This loan cycle is his first one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy some fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor. 

His strategy for the growth of his business is to use select seeds and chemical fertilizers for his rice farming. 

In the next few years, Emmanuel would like to be the No. 1 farmer in her region. With the profits, he plans on educating his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Leonor

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Chibuto, Província de Gaza, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e mãe de 8 filhos dos quais apenas 5 frequentam a Escola e os outros já formaram suas famílias. Nunca teve oportunidade de frequentar a Escola por falta de condições financeiras pela parte de seus pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 
	

Saiu de Gaza para Maputo no Distrito de Boane a procura de emprego, é negociante há mais de 3 anos dedica-se a venda de produtos diversos e também curandeira há 23anos e tem um rendimento de cerca de 8.600.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu sétimo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria (refrescos, óleo, cervejas sumos, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 2.500.00mt, 5.000.00mt, 8.000.00mt, 10.000.00mt, 15.000.00mt, e 25.000.00mt, aplicados no comércio. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende fazer crescer o seu negócio para satisfazer os seus clientes, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in Chibuto, province of Gaza, southern Mozambique. She's single and has 8 children - only 5 of them attend school, the others have already started their own families. She never had the opportunity to go to school because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She left Gaza for Maputo, in the district of Boane, in search of a job. She has been a businesswoman for over 3 years and sells various products. She's also been a healer for 23 years and earns an income of about 8.600mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her 7th loan with Hluvuku. It is for 20.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase goods in order to increase the quantity of her merchandise (refreshments, oil, beer, juice, etc.). The previous loans were for 2.500mt, 5.000mt, 8.000mt, 10.000mt, 15.000mt and 25.000mt, for her retail business.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future she plans to expand her business so that she can keep her customers satisfied. For that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (refreshments, oil, beer, juice, etc.).

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Namaacha, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez a 2ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte de seus pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 
	
 É negociante há mais de10 anos dedica-se a venda de produtos diversos e tem um rendimento de cerca de 5.000.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria (amendoim, feijão, óleo, cervejas sumos, e outros). 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende comprar uma camioneta para auxiliar no transporte dos produtos, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
He was born in the district of Namaacha, province of Maputo, southern Mozambique. He's married and has two children, both of which attend school. He completed 2nd grade and stopped because his parents lacked financial conditions. He lives with his family in a house he owns and does not support anyone else.
He has been a businessman for over 10 years. He sells various products and earns an income of about 5.000mt. He uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in his bank account.
He has never had loans with other banks. He first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is his second loan with Hluvuku. It is for 20.000mt, which he intends to use to purchase goods in order to increase the quantity of his merchandise (peanuts, beans, oil, beer, juice, etc.).
He pledges to make his repayments as scheduled. In the future he plans to purchase a truck to help him transport his merchandise. For that purpose he plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (peanuts, beans, oil, beer, juices, etc.).

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 6 filhos todos já formaram suas famílias. Fez a 7ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte de seus pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 
	

 É negociante há mais de 30 anos dedica-se a compra e venda de produtos alimentares e tem um rendimento de cerca de 8.000.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu quarto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 18.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria (amendoim, arroz, farinha, óleo, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 7.000.00mt, 10.000.00mt, e 15.000.00mt, aplicados no negócio. 

Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende ampliar o seu negócio para melhor satisfazer os seus clientes, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
She was born in the district of Boane, province of Maputo, southern Mozambique. She's married and has 6 children, all of whom have already started their own families. She completed 7th grade and stopped because her parents lacked financial conditions. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She has been a businesswoman for over 30 years. She buys and sells foodstuffs and earns an income of about 8.000mt. She uses it to pay for home expenses and also saves part of it in her bank account.
She has never had loans in other banks. She first heard of Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of this institution. This is her 4th loan with Hluvuku. It is for 18.000mt, which she intends to use to purchase goods in order to increase the quantity of her merchandise (peanuts, rice, flour, oil, etc.). The previous loans were for 7.000mt, 10.000mt and 15.000mt, for her business.
She pledges to make her repayments as scheduled. In the future she plans to expand her business so that she can keep her customers satisfied. For that purpose she plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to purchase goods for selling (peanuts, rice, flour, oil, etc.).

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина замужем. Ее супруга зовут Анатолий. У них двое детей.  Ирина имеет собственный бизнес.

Ирина занимается фермерством на протяжении 20 лет. Она выращивает ранний редис, помидоры, баклажаны и картошку. Ирине нравится это направление. Она трудолюбивая, предприимчивая и энергичная, всегда готова помогать окружающим. 

Ирина просит предоставить кредит в сумме 15,000 гривен на закупку  семян, пленки, удобрений. А также часть кредита пойдет на капельное орошение.  Кредит поможет ей увеличить доход, и тем самым улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en:
Irina is married. Her husband's name is Anatoliy and they have two children. Irina has her own business.

Irina has been doing farming for twenty years. She grows early radish, tomatoes, eggplant and potatoes. Irina likes this type of business. She is hardworking, entrepreneurial and energetic and always ready to help others.

Irina is asking to provide her with a loan in the amount of 15,000 hryvna to buy seeds, film and fertilizer. Also part of the loan will be used for sprinkler irrigation. The loan will help her increase her income and by that improve the well being of her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, film and fertilizer.

loans.name: Avila Group

texts.fr:
Mme MARIAMA est la représentante du groupe AVILA. Elle est mariée  et mère de 08 enfants. Le plus âgé a 21ans et le moins âgé a 03ans.07 vont à l’école. Elle a 10personnes en charge.

Elle est Tisserant  depuis 22ans. Elle s’approvisionne à  nabi yare et au SIAO  en ville .Ses clients sont les voisins, les amis et les citadins.

Elle veut  s’acheter 01 balle de fils et 01kg plus 3/4kg de teinte.

 Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut renforcer son activité. Elle ambitionne  agrandir son activité ; aider son mari à payer la scolarité de ses enfants et ouvrir un centre de formation.
texts.en:
Ms. MARIAMA is the representative of the group AVILA. She is married and the mother of eight children. The oldest is 21 years old, and the youngest is 3. Seven of them go to school. She has ten persons to support. 

She has been a weaver for 22 years. She gets her supplies from Nabi Yare and at the SIAO in town. Her customers are neighbors, friends, and city dwellers. 

She wants to buy 10 balls of yarn and 1¾ kg of dye. 

With the profits, she wants to bolster her business. Her ambition is to expand her business, help her husband to pay her children's schooling costs, and open a training center.

loans.use: to buy 10 balls of yarn and 1.75 kg of dye

loans.name: Koukin Yaare Group

texts.fr:
Mme Alizeta est responsable du groupe KOUKIN YAARE. Elle est veuve et mère de 4 enfants. Le plus âgé a 27ans et le moins âgé a 13ans.1 va à l’école et elle a 4 personne a sa charge.

Elle est tisseuse depuis 30ans. Mme s’approvisionne au marché de secteur 10 en ville. Ses clients sont les hommes et les femmes.

Elle veut s’acheter deux (02) balles de fils de tisse et 1kg de teinture toute couleur confondue.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle économise  pour assurer le remboursement  de son crédit. Elle ambitionne  agrandir  son atelier de tissage et subvenir à la scolarisation de son enfant.
texts.en:
Ms. Alizeta is the person responsible for the Koukin Yaare group. She is a widow with four children. The oldest is 27 years old and the youngest is 13. One goes to school and she has four persons under her care.

Mrs. Alizeta has been a weaver for 30 years. She resupplies at the Sector 10 market in town. Her clients are both men and women.

She wants to buy two balls of weaving yarn and one kilo of dyes of various colors

With her profits, she is saving to ensure repayment of her credit loan. She aims to expand her weaving workshop and provide for her child's education.

loans.use: buy two balls of weaving yarn and one kilo of dyes of various colors

loans.name: Wendbingda Group

texts.fr:
Mme Pauline est la représentante du groupe WENDBINGDA. Elle est marie et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 19ans et le moins âgé a 15ans. Les 02 vont à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge.

Elle fait le jardinage et vend des légumes depuis 15ans. Son approvisionnement dans une boutique au secteur 10. Ses clients sont les femmes et hommes.

 Elle veut s’acheter de l’engrais, 02 sachets de semence en salade, 05sachets  en choux et 04 sachets  en menthe.

Mme économise  pour  s’occuper de ses enfants. Elle ambitionne assurer l’éducation  de ses enfants et agrandir son jardin.
texts.en:
Mrs. Pauline is the representative of the Wendbingda group. She is married and the mother of two children. The oldest is 19 years old and younger one is 15. Both children attend school. She has three persons under her care.

Mrs. Pauline started keeping a garden and selling vegetables 15 years ago. She buys her supplies in a shop located in Sector 10. Her customers are both men and women.

She wants to buy fertilizer, two small bags of lettuce seed, five small bags of cabbage seed and four small bags of mint seed. Mrs. Pauline saves to provide for her children. She intends to support their education and expand her garden.

loans.use: buy fertilizer, two small bags of lettuce seed, five small bags of cabbage seed and four small bags of mint seed

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy three dozen tops for women and girls and 15 complete outfits for children

loans.name: Farida's Group

texts.en:
Farida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her animal-selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy young goats and sheep.  She will raise them and sell to butchers for a profit.

She is very active and gets up early in the morning to give good quality food to her cattle. Because of this they are healthy.

Her husband is a government servant and earns a low income that is not enough for the whole family. That was the reason Farida started her business a few years ago.

She has given birth to two sons and a daughter. Her eldest son works in a government organization and her remaining two children are continuing their education.

Farida is very confident that her business will become more profitable after investing the loan.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Farida.

loans.use: To buy goats and sheep

loans.name: Suriya's Group

texts.en:
Suriya has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine, which will enable her to finish the orders on time and increase her profits.

She is very experienced in her work and well known among her clients for her quality work. She is confident that by purchasing a new sewing machine her business will be established further.

Her husband does a job and her eldest son is a laborer. Her two daughters remain at home.

Suriya is a very positive thinking lady and never loses hope. She is confident about her family’s better financial future.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Shabana's Group

texts.en:
Shabana is 28 years old, married and has a six-month-old daughter.
 
She supports her family by operating a beauty salon at her home. She is very skillful and creative in her work and specializes in bridal makeup.

Due to her good quality work, she earns a reasonably good income from her business. She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her parlor business. With the loan investment, she will buy beauty products, shampoos, etc. to offer even better services to her clients and improve her business.

She is now an experienced person in her business and confident that her business will be expanded further after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy shampoo and other beauty products

loans.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
Nasreen has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her animal-selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy young goats and sheep. She will raise them by giving them good quality food and by taking care of them and will sell them to the butchers for a profit. She is a very experienced lady and has a good number of business contacts. She is confident that a loan investment will bring positive changes to her business.

She is very active and a mother of three daughters and a son. Her elder daughter is illiterate and the others are continuing their studies. Nasreen is very skillful and also knows the art of sewing. She works for her neighboring clients in her spare time and earns a reasonable profit. She is confident about her family’s bright future as a result of her business improvement.

loans.use: to buy goats and sheep to raise and sell

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s agriculture business. With the loan investment, he will buy fertilizers and seeds in larger quantity and of better quality to be able to get better crops and increase his sales and profits. He is very experienced in his business and Shazia is confident that he will make good use of the loan money and will successfully expand his business.

Shazia is a seamstress who sews clothes for her neighboring clients to earn profits for her family. She is also a very good housewife and takes care of her household work very well.  She is the mother of four sons and two daughters. She couldn’t provide education to her children due to financial constraints

She is very positive in her thinking and very much sure of her husband’s business success after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a thirty-nine-year-old lady from Migori. She is married to Samson and they have six children aged three to twenty years old.

Jane operates an agro-veterinary shop selling livestock drugs, a business she has been doing for the last eight years. She makes a monthly income of KES 8,000. She is taking her eighth loan from KADET LTD. which she will use to buy more animal drugs to sell.

She will use profits to repay back the loan. Her dreams and hopes is to grow her business and provide basic needs for  her family.

loans.use: To buy a stock of animal drugs for her agro-veterinary business.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a farmer and has been doing it for the past six years. She is married and they have three children who are in college.


Veronica has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy pesticides and fertilizers .She was introduced to KADET LTD by a fellow client.

She hopes to have a big farm in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Jennifer
