texts.en: Mrs. Oulimata is 42 years old. She lives in  one of the neighborhoods of   Senegal's capital city. She is married and the mother of three. She sells natural fruit juices that she prepares herself. She also cooks food for sale, as a secondary activity. She has inherited her business from her aunt, who has taught her. From an early age on, she used to resell goods brought by her aunt from her travels. She has chosen selling fruits because local products are  very popular with the customers. She is a member of a branch of U-IMCEC and seeking a loan of 300,000 francs for the purchase of a cart that will allow her helper to transport the juices to her selling location. The increased revenues will allow her to grow her business and better provide for her personal needs.

loans.use: to buy a cart needed for selling fruit juices.

loans.name: Rukhshona

texts.ru: Рухшона разведенная женщина, которая на воспитании имеет двух сыновей. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина и более одного года  занимается пошивом женской одежды. В основном она шьет национальные платья, вышивку, реставрирует женские костюмы и кожаные изделия. Ателье находится в торговом центре города. Имеет 5 работников- мастеров, которые с ней работают и одну ученицу. Открыла бизнес  собственными денежными средствами в 2010 году. Ее мать также помогает по бизнесу. Рухшона хотела бы получить займ для покупки фурнитур и оплата за аренду помещений.
texts.en: Rukhshona is a divorced woman who is raising two sons.  She is a very hardworking woman and has been making women's clothing for more than a year.  Primarily, she sews traditional dresses, embroiders, and repairs women's suits and leather goods.  Her studio is in the city's shopping center.  She has five trained workers and one student.  She opened her business with her own funds in 2010.  Her mother also helps her with the business.  Rukhshona would like to take out a loan for the purchase of sewing supplies and to pay the rent for her storefront.

loans.use: to purchase sewing supplies and pay for rent

loans.name: Salavmat

texts.ru: Салавмат более 6 лет занимается купле- продажей детской одежды. Салавмат замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Она очень активная женщина и старается расширить свой бизнес. Она приобретает товар 1-2 раза в неделю. Так как она привозит высококачественные товары, её клиенты доверяет ей и приходят за покупками к ней. Салавмат запрашивает займ для покупки новой одежды с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Salavmat has been in the children's clothing business for over 6 years.  Salavmat is married and the loving mother of five children.  She is a very energetic woman and is trying to expand her business.  She buys merchandise once or twice a week.  Since she brings in high-quality merchandise, her customers trust her and come to her for their purchases.  Salavmat is requesting a loan for the purchase of new clothing with the goal of expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Albina

texts.es:
Albina de 66 años, es una mujer humilde y sencilla; desde que falleció su esposo ahora ella esta al tanto de sus dos queridos hijos Daniel de 24 años  y Joel de 19 años y juntos habitan en su propia casa. Albina, es una mujer muy empeñosa, desde muy tempranas horas se dirige a sus campos de cultivo donde siembra plantas de coca; este producto le llevo a seguir adelante para que pueda dar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos; lleva 37 años realizando esta actividad, antes lo hacia con la ayuda de su esposo y ahora lo realiza con el apoyo de sus dos hijos quienes la apoyan en todos sus esfuerzos. En la cogida de la hoja de coca pues cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes le ayudan a extraer sus hojas de manera rápida, después realiza el secado  correspondiente para llevarlas a vender a las sociedades de compra; es ahí donde le remuneran buenas  ganancias por cada arroba de coca. Sus planes a futuro es que sus hijos sean profesionales y tengan una buena estadía. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago. Asimismo agradece a los integrantes de su banco comunal por ser personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el crédito solicitado contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen a fumigar sus plantas y con el resto ayudará a sus hijos en sus gastos de estudio.
texts.en: Albina is 66 and is a humble and simple woman.  Since her husband passed away, she now watches out for her two beloved children:  Daniel, who is 24, and Joel, who is 19.  They all live together in their own home.  Albina is a very hard-working woman.  Starting very early in the morning, she goes to her fields where she harvests coca plants.  This product lets her get ahead and give her children a better quality of life.  She has done this work for 37 years.  She used to do it with the help of her husband, and now she has the help of her 2 sons, who help her with her efforts.  When harvesting the coca, she has help from day workers, who help her pick the leaves quickly.  Afterwards, she takes them to the buying organizations.  This is where they pay her well by weight of the coca.  Her future plans are to see her children become professionals and that they have a good stay.  This will be her fifth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, and she promises to be very punctual with her payments.  She is thankful to the members of her communal bank for being responsible and supportive.  With the requested loan, she will hire day laborers to help her fumigate her plants, and she will use the rest to help her children with their educational costs.

loans.use: To hire day laborers and to help her children with their education.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 26 años, es una mujer coqueta y hacendosa, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su pareja Juan de 29 años y sus 02 queridas hijas Mireya de 06 años y Jayde de 05 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El puesto de ventas de abarrotes de la señora Rosa es muy presentable y ordenado; es por ello que a la gente de su localidad en especial los de su avenida se dirigen a comprar sus productos ya que pueden encontrar lo necesario; hace 16 años empezó a trabajar con su negocio y comenta que le ha ido muy bien; ahora gracias a sus ganancias ha logrado comprar un terreno en la pueda construir su hogar. Ella esta siempre al pendiente de su bodega y su esposo le ayuda en los trabajos de la chacra. Ahora lo que mas anhela es poder incrementar mas productos para su negocio y darles una buena educación a sus pequeñas hijas. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago como en las anteriores. En su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable y solidaria. Con el préstamo solicitado comprará mas productos de arroz, azúcar, leche, entre otros. Y de esa forma llegará a abastecer su tienda.
texts.en: Rosa, who is 26 years old, is a sweet and hardworking woman.  She lives in a rented house together with her partner Juan, who is 29 years old, and their two dear daughters, 6-year old Mireya and 5-year old Jayde.  She hopes to offer them a better quality of life.  Señora Rosa's shop is very presentable and organized.  That is why the people in her neighborhood, especially those on her street, come to her shop to make their purchases; they can find what they need.  She started her business 16 years ago and says that it has been going very well for her.  Now, thanks to her earnings, she has been able to purchase a plot of land on which to build her home.  Rosa is always devoted to her store and her husband helps with with the work on their small farm.  Now what Rosa most wants is to be able to increase the inventory for her business and to give her young daughters a good education.  This will be her 5th loan with MFP.  Rosa promises to be timely with her re-payment, just like she was with her previous loans.  Rosa is a very responsible and supportive member of her communal bank.  With the requested loan, she will purchase more rice, sugar and milk products, among other items.  And then she will be able to stock up her store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar and milk to stock up her store.

loans.name: Mohira

texts.ru: Мохира замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Муж является мастером. Более 3-х лет Мохира занимается купле- продажей детской одежды и мелочевки. В бизнесе помогает сестра. Один-два раза в неделю она приобретает товар, чтобы пополнить оборотный капитал. Мохира запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки летней детской одежды. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Mohira is married and is raising two children.  She is a very hardworking and decent woman.  Her husband is a craftsman.  For over three years, she has been selling children's clothes and sundries.  Her sister helps her with the business.  She buys merchandise once or twice a week to replenish her inventory.  Mohira is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni for the purchase of children's summer clothes.  She is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes

loans.name: Muyasar

texts.ru:
Муясар трудолюбивая добрая и честная женщина, которая на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 11 лет она занимается купле- продажей сельхозпродукции. Имеет широкий ассортимент овощей. Данный бизнес является прибыльным и она имеет много постоянных клиентов. Она обновляет свой товар по чаще, один-два раза в неделю.
Она всегда привозит свежие продукты. Муясар хотела бы получить займ для покупки сельхозпродукции с целью расширения бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Muyasar is a hardworking, good, and honest woman who is raising three children.  For over 11 years she has been selling fruits and vegetables.  She has a wide assortment of vegetables.  This business is profitable and she has many regular customers.  She restocks her inventory frequently--once or twice a week.  She always brings in fresh fruits and vegetables.  

Muyasar would like to take out a loan for the purchase of fruits with the goal of expanding her business.  She is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy fruits

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es: Aydee, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer buena y afanosa en los que haberes de su hogar, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Yuri de 38 años y su querida hija Britney de 09 años; quienes desean tener un buen futuro con el tiempo. La actividad que realiza Aydee, es labrar la tierra en su propio campo de cultivo que durante 14  años llego a adquirir con mucho esmero. Aydee junto a su pareja elaboran el cuidado de sus plantas de cacao, café y hojas de coca. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver los apreciados frutos que con el tiempo le resulta  provechoso por la manera como efectúa su producción; por otra parte considera difícil que las plagas afecten sus siembras ya que son difíciles de lidiarlas. Es por eso que acude a MFP para requerir un préstamo en cual ayude con sus objetivos de trabajo. Con el tiempo desea en agrandar sus terrenos y poder cultivar mas plantas de cacao. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; y se siente contenta de saber que obtendrá un apoyo financiero. En su banco comunal le gusta trabajar con personas que ayuden a las posibilidades de su prójimo. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de cacao para sembrar en su chacra y con el resto contratará peones para que le ayuden.
texts.en:
Aydee, 30 years old, is a good woman and industrious, having household property, living in her own house together with her partner, Yuri, who is 38 years old and her dear daughter Britney who is 9 years old. They hope that with time she will have a good future. 

Aydee farms the land in her own fields that over 14 years she has obtained through extreme care. Aydee together with her partner take care of cocoa, coffee and coca leaves. What she likes most about her work is being able to see the valued fruit that with time is the profitable result because of the way she cares for the production. On the other hand, what she finds difficult is the pests that affect their crops that are so hard to fight against. 

This is why she went to MFP to request a loan which will help her with her work objectives. Over time she wants to add more land and to be able to grow more cocoa plants. This will be her fifth loan through MFP and she feels happy knowing that she will obtain financial assistance. In her communal bank she likes working with people and having the possibility of helping a neighbor. With the 2,000 soles, she will buy cocoa plants in order to plant her farm and with the rest she will hire laborers to help her.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa plants and hire laborers

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is a 31 year-old single mother who lives in a rented home along with her two daughters: Jackelin, 10, and Yasuri, 8, to whom she provides meticulous care and love.  She is a very hardworking woman who has a business selling vegetables in the market in her area.  She has been doing this work for 8 years, and for her this work is very easy.  She does not need a lot of help, and so she is able to do the work on her own, although she enjoys being with her daughters because they are her only happiness.  Elsa's work is very profitable, because she is always selling her produce and in this way she is able to pay for her household expenses as well as her daughter's school expenses.  She will invest this loan that she is requesting in her produce stand.  However, what she desires the most is to be given a snack bar in her daughter's school where she could sell candy as well as cold cuts, because then she could allocate her time between the two businesses and in this way manage to change her quality of life and provide her daughters with a good education.  This will be her 2nd loan with MFP, and she promises to make her payments on time.  Also, she is a responsible member of her communal bank.  With the 2,000 Peruvian soles she requests, she will buy produce such as: carrots, pumpkin, potatoes, sweet potatoes, celery and other products for her post in the market.  Also, she will buy cookies, candy, drinks and other items so that she can put them in her school snack bar.

loans.use: to buy carrots, pumpkin, potatoes, sweet potatoes, and celery, and also to buy cookies and candy

loans.name: Fathiya

texts.en:
Fathiya is a 51-year-old housewife. She lives with her husband and their nine children, except the ones who are already married. To help her husband, a bus driver, support their big family, Fathiya started to make different kinds of pickles at home to sell. It has been 11 years since she started. Besides her daily new customers, Fathiya has old customers and families who only buy their pickles from her every time they run out.

Fathiya has applied for this loan to buy different sizes of bottles, since some people are looking to buy small amounts based on their needs. She also wants to try making new kinds of pickles that are not available in the market.

Fathiya is a conservative person, so she asked her daughter, Hind, to take her place in the photo.

loans.use: to buy different sizes of bottles for the pickles she makes

loans.name: Suha

texts.en:
Suha wanted to take advantage of the fact that her kids are still young and she has time to help her husband provide their children with a respectful life, so she started a home business making fake flowers and plants that are used for internal decorations. Suha is a conservative person, so she has asked her brother-in-law to take her place in the photo.

Suha is a 27-year-old married lady. She is the mother of one daughter and one son. Suha has applied for this loan in order to buy more plastic and materials that are used to make more colorful plants.

loans.use: to buy more plastic and materials for making fake flowers

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita, de 36 años, es una mujer afanosa y comprometida, vive en su propia casa junto a su cónyuge Máximo de 45 años y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes desea brinda una mejor calidad de vida. Margarita es una mujer de trabajo; en los tiempos de lluvia su labor esta en su hogar, en la que le dedica todo su tiempo a sus labores domesticas. En la actividad  del cultivo de plantas de cacao y café,  lleva 17 años realizando y siente que cosechar es  parte de su esfuerzo después del arduo sacrificio. Es muy amigable y sociable, el cultivo  es lo que mejor sabe hacer, por ello aprovecha todas las oportunidades de poder estar siempre en su chacra, ya que sólo de ese modo ayuda en solventar sus propios gastos. Con el tiempo desea en hacer crecer su producción ya que ella y su familia dependen de las cosechas que por temporadas realiza. Lo que ahora prioriza es poder realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos; por que quiere que siempre estén my fértil. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; se compromete a pagar de forma puntual sus cuotas, para que en otra oportunidad logre acceder a otro. En su banco comunal es una socia alegre y responsable.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará insecticidas, funguicidas, abonos, entre otros; y así poder mantener sanas y fuertes sus plantas.
texts.en:
Margarita, age 36, is an industrious and devoted woman.  She lives in her own house together with her 45 year old husband, Máximo, and their three beloved children.  They want to give the children a better quality of life.  

Margarita is a hard-working woman.  When it rains she works at home, devoting all of her time to the household chores.  She has been growing cacao and coffee for 17 years.  She feels that the harvest is hard-won after the arduous sacrifice.

She is very friendly and sociable.  Farming is what she knows how to do the best.  Therefore, she always takes advantage of all of the opportunities to be  on her farm.  This is the only way she helps pay for her own expenses.

In time she wishes to make her production grow because she and her family depend upon the seasonal harvests.  Her priority now is to be able to perform maintenance on her crops because she wants them to always be very fertile.

This is her fifth loan with MFP.  She pledges to make her payments punctually in order to have an opportunity to access another loan.  She is a very happy and responsible member of her communal bank.

She will use the 2,000 soles to buy insecticides, fungicides, fertilizers, and others.  This way she will be able to keep her plants healthy and strong.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fungicides, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.ru: Рустамчон проживает в городе Худжанд. Ему 38 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Рустамчон разводит скот у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 10 лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Rustamjon lives in the city of Khujand.  He is 38 years old and married.  He has three children.  He earns a living by means of breeding cattle.  Rustamjon raises the cattle at his home.  He has been in this business for 10 years.  He is taking out a loan to buy bull-calves.

loans.use: to buy bull-calves

loans.name: Bilol

texts.ru: Билол проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 47 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Билол более пяти лет занимается птицеводством у себя дома. Он берет кредит для закупа кур.
texts.en: Bilol lives in the city of Isfara.  He is 47 years old and married.  He has two children.  For more than five years Bilol has been breeding poultry at his home.  He is taking out a loan to buy chickens.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Sayvali

texts.ru: Сайвали житель района Хамадони. Он женат. Ему 47 лет. У него четверо детей. Сайвали открыл аптеку, где занимается торговлей лекарств. В этой области он работает 23 года. Кредит берет для приобретения антибиотиков, шприцов и других необходимых препаратов.
texts.en: Sayvali is a resident of the Hamadoni region.  He is 47 years old and married.  He has four children.  Sayvali opened a pharmacy where he sells medicines.  He has been in this field for 23 years.  He is taking out a loan to purchase antibiotics, syringes, and other necessary medicines.

loans.use: to purchase antibiotics, syringes, and other necessary medications

loans.name: Manzurajon

texts.ru: Манзурачон жительница города Худжанд. Ей 43 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Манзурачон занимается торговлей на рынке. У нее имеется торговая точка, где она продает мужскую одежду. Торговлей Манзурачон занимается десять лет. Она берет кредит для приобретения сезонного товара.
texts.en: Manzurajon is a resident of the city of Khujand.  She is 43 years old, married, and has three children.  Manzurajon sells at the market.  She has a sales location where she sells men's clothing.  She has been selling for ten years.  She is taking out a loan to buy seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his vehicle and perform maintenance.

loans.name: Natasha

texts.ru: Наташа хочет взять кредит, чтобы за одну поездку привезти больше товара - сумочки из новой коллекции 2012 года. Она посчитала, что выгодней взять кредит, чем ездить два раза за товаром (ездить нужно в другой город). Благодаря предыдущему кредиту Наталья закупила товар и увеличила ассортимент. Полученный доход она потратила на улучшение бытовых условий своей семьи.
texts.en:
Natasha wants to take out a loan in order to make one trip to buy more merchandise:  purses from the new 2012 collection.  Since she has to travel to a different city, she calculates that it will be more profitable to take out a loan and make one trip than to make two trips to buy merchandise.  

Thanks to her previous loan, Natasha bought up merchandise and increased her assortment.  She spent the income she earned on improving her family's day-to-day living conditions.

loans.use: to buy purses from a new collection

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy, de 52 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Wagner, su esposo desde hace 17 años. Ambos tienen un hijo Eduar a quien cuida en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Pio Pata. Su esposo es contador de profesión, juntos abrieron un estudio contable, donde brinda sus servicios. A pesar de no haber estudiado para el ejercicio, sabe mucho del tema, pues ayuda a su esposo en lo que pueda. Mientras ella se dedica a la venta de útiles de escritorio y productos de librería, en un espacio cerca de él. Ya tiene 15 años dedicándose a ello, no cuenta con un lugar propio, pues alquila la oficina y tienda, que se encuentran en un lugar céntrico y estratégico para poder desarrollar su negocio en todo este tiempo. Además de confiar en su hijo, quien quiere estudiar la misma carrera de su padre, como es una mujer empeñosa y muy segura de sí misma, sabe que podrá trabajar y orientar a su hijo a estudiar una carrera profesional que le ayude en el futuro. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nueva Vida” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias. Nancy de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de millares de papeles para su librería.
texts.en:
Nancy, 52, is an unassuming woman. She lives with Wagner, her husband of 17 years. They have a son, Eduar, whom they are raising in their own home situated in the town of Pio Pata.  Her husband is an accountant by profession. Together they opened an accounting office where they serve their clients.

Despite not having studied for the accounting exam, Nancy knows a lot about the topic and helps her husband as much as she can. In the meantime, she sells office supplies and stationary products in a space nearby. She has spent 15 years in this endeavor but does not have her own place. She rents the office and store, which are centrally and strategically located, and has been able to develop her business over the years. 

Nancy is committed to her son, who wants to study the same profession as his father. As she is a very hardworking woman who is very sure of herself, she knows that she will be able to work and orient her son to study a professional career that will help him in the future.

Nancy belongs to the Nueva Vida Communal Bank and this is her eighth loan with MFP, where she feels fulfilled since she is receiving the help she needs to advance in her business. She promises to be punctual in making her payments. In addition, she enjoys working with members of her bank because they are responsible and supportive people. Upon receiving your help, she will invest the money in purchasing reams of paper for her office supplies store.

loans.use: to purchase reams of paper.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda, de 52 años es una mujer responsable. Vive en compañía de Humberto, su esposo desde hace 30 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo vive con uno de ellos: Nelson a quien educa en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pilcomayo. Gracias a su  trabajo pudo comprar un ómnibus con el que  realiza transporte público cubriendo las ruta de Huancayo hacia la cuidad de Jauja, ahí su esposo se dedica a administrar su negocio. Por su parte ella se dedica al cuidado de ovejas, las cuales cuida con mucho esmero y alimenta constantemente, pues depende de ello, su venta en el mercado de carnes de la ciudad. “Con la venta de carne obtengo más ingresos, además me gusta mucho”, afirma Yolanda, quien también se abrió una tienda de comestibles en su casa, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, “ahí el dinero no circula, tienes que comprar alimentos que se venderán en 2 o 3 días”, afirma, por ello necesita dinero para poder capitalizar su negocio, no puede mesclar los ingresos menciona, pues cada negocio tiene su propia ganancia, menciona. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Nueva vida” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias. Yolanda de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda de comestible.
texts.en:
Yolanda, age 52, is a responsable woman.  She lives with Humberto, her husband of 30 years.  They have four children.  Only one child, Nelson, lives with them.  She is raising him in her own home in Pilcomayo. 

Thanks to her work she was able to buy a bus.  It is used for public transportation and covers the route from Huancayo towards the city of Jauja.  That is where her husband devotes himself to administering the business.

For her part, she raises sheep.  She takes care of them with great care, and she always feeds them.  Her sales at the meat market in the city are dependent upon it.  “With the sale of meat I get more income, and I really like it,” Yolanda says.  

She also opened a food store in her house, and she sells basic needs products.  “Here the money is not dispersed because you have to buy food that will sell in two or three days,” she says.  That is why she needs money to be able to invest in her business.  You cannot mix the incomes she has mentioned.  She states that each business has its own income.

She belongs to the “Nueva Vida” (New Life) communal bank.  This is her eighth loan with MFP, where she feels empowered because she gets help to progress with her business.  She pledges to make her payments punctually.  Also, she likes working with her communal bank because the people are responsible and supportive.  Upon receiving your support Yolanda will use the loan to buy basic needs products for her food store.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products to stock her store.

loans.name: Nazia Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Nazia bibi is a 23-year-old married woman.  She is a very caring lady and makes the utmost effort to provide comfort to her family by fulfilling their needs.  Her husband is a cobbler by profession and offers his services as a worker in a factory where he earns income on a monthly basis.  He is very experienced in his business and has been doing it for over six years.  He is very honest in his work and has a good reputation among his co-workers for his skills and his work ethic. 

Nazia has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband because he wants to start his own shoe-making business.  He will use the loan to buy large quantities of leather and nails as well as a shoe-polisher so that he can attract his own clients and earn a good income by completing orders for them. 

Nazia is hopeful that this loan will enable her husband to firmly establish his business.

loans.use: to buy leather, nails and a shoe-polisher for her husband's shoe-making business.

loans.name: Marième

texts.fr:
Marième est une dame de 64 ans, qui s’active dans le commerce depuis 10 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle achète et vend des produits divers : de l’huile de palme, des tissus teintés. Malgré son âge, elle fait aussi la navette entre le Sénégal et la Mauritanie pour chercher des produits comme du  savon, du lait, de la mayonnaise en pot, qui sont des produits qui se vendent pas chers là bas ; c’est d’ailleurs le but de son prêt. Dans le but de diversifier aussi ses  sources de revenus, madame Marième travaille aussi dans l’usine de transformation de céréales locales.
Elle n’a pas de charges qui l’encombrent mais donne sa participation dans la gestion des besoins familiaux. Et travaille pour de meilleures conditions de vie de son foyer.
texts.en:
Marième is a 64-year-old woman who has been actively involved in retail business for the past 10 years.  She is married and has a family.  

She buys and sells various products such as palm oil and dyed fabrics.  In spite of her age, she also commutes between Senegal and Mauritania to buy soap, milk, jars of mayonnaise (all products that are cheaper in Mauritania).  This is actually why she is requesting a loan.

In order to diversify her sources of income, Marième also works at a local grain processing plant.

She has no extra charges and uses her income to contribute to family expenses.  She works to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy various products such as soap, milk, jars of mayonnaise, palm oil and dyed fabrics.

loans.name: Parveen's Group

texts.en:
Parveen is a talented lady who operates a sewing and embroidery business.  She works out of her home, receiving orders from her relatives and clients from the local neighborhood to generate income for her family.  She has been in business for over six years.  She loves doing her sewing work and, because her work is of very good quality, she never receives any complaints from her clients.  

She also likes to do embroidery work.  She does embroidery on clothing and gives the clothes a new look.  She keeps herself up to date on the latest trends in fashion, which helps her understand her clients’ needs.
 
Her husband is a painter and paints both walls and buildings on contract.  They both contribute to the family financially from their earnings. 

Parveen has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her own business.  She will use this loan to buy an embroidery machine.  The new machine will enable her complete more orders from her clients in a timely fashion, allowing her to increase her income.  She is very confident about the further growth of her embroidery business.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en:
Fatmeh, 31 years old, is widowed. She is now responsible for raising her three kids. For that reason, she had to open a small business to have a monthly income to support her family, so she opened a small kiosk in front of her house to sell snacks and few basic food items. 

She has applied for this loan to add more products to the store to be able to serve the neighborhood as much as she can therefore increasing her income.

loans.use: to add more products to the grocery store

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en:
Fatmeh is 47 years old and a married woman. Her husband has already retired from the military. They have seven sons and daughters.

Fatmeh sells different types of snacks and chips for the neighborhood’s kids, and she now wants to add more food products such as salt, sugar, canned foods, etc., to what she sells. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to add more food products to her store

loans.name: Najdiya

texts.en:
Najdiya is 63 years old and widowed. She is currently living with her two sons and daughter.

For three years now, Najdiya has been selling blankets and bed covers at home to the neighbors, relatives and friends.

Now she wants to start preparing for the next season and buy more bed covers as all she has now are heavy blankets for winter. For that reason, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy more bed covers

loans.name: Etidal

texts.en:
Etidal is 42 years old and a divorced woman. She is responsible for supporting her six children.

To be able to do so, she started a small retail business selling cosmetic products from one company and became one of their saleswomen in the market. 

Now Etidal wants to expand and include more cosmetic products and such to what she sells. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to expand and include more cosmetic products

loans.name: Fawzia

texts.en:
Fawzia is 46 years old and a housewife. Her husband began farming after he retired from the military to be able to support their five sons.

Fawzia wanted to help her husband as well so she started a small retail business selling clothes and blankets from home. She has found that she is making a reasonable income based on what she has, so she decided to add more variety to the collection she has and add selling home products to her range. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to expand into selling home products

loans.name: Kea's Group

texts.en:
Kea is 33 years old.  She is a single lady living in a remote village of the Thmor Koul district, Battambang province.  To make a living, she has been farming as the main source of her income as well as running a stall, selling biscuits and vegetables to earn additional income.  She has been working in these businesses for four years.

Kea joined VisionFund in 2008 and she has already taken five consecutive loans.  Each loan was successfully repaid.  The loans have enabled her to manage the family’s cash flow, especially to buy additional items to sell in her stall, allowing her to earn a better living than before. 

Now she forms and leads a new group as she enters her sixth loan cycle.  She is requesting a new loan in amount of 400,000 KHR.  A portion of this loan will be used to buy fertilizer and seed for her farmland while the remaining portion will be used to buy additional items for her stall such as biscuits, canned food, etc.  She hopes to increase her income from both businesses so that she will have enough money to buy a motorbike to support both of her businesses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed for her farmland as well as to buy additional items for her stall.

loans.name: Chanthou

texts.en:
Chanthou, pictured in the photo, is 28 years old and her husband, Sitha, who is also 28 years old, have been married since 2005.  They have three young children, one son and two daughters.  The family is living in a village about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Chanthou is a farmer and her husband is a cleaner.  She is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: Claudia, es alegre y empeñosa, tiene 40 años; es esposa de Alejandro de 43 años y son padres de sus dos hermosas hijas Tania de 18 años y Maydelin de 08 años; juntos viven en su propia casa. Claudia, es una mujer optimista y siempre esta al tanto de su familia; durante tanto tiempo estuvo con la mira en abrir una cevicheria en su localidad y de esa manera pueda ofrecer una buena atención; empezó arreglando su local para que pueda estar bien presentable y llame la atención de la gente; desde entonces hoy cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y ambos se dedican a brindar una buena atención al cliente. Ella desde muy temprano esta en su local y las personas que transitan siempre llegan a probar el esquisto placer de comer su rico ceviche junto a su refresco; así es como atiende Claudia es por eso que la gente siempre esta recurriendo al puesto de  Cevicheria de Claudia. Al principio empezó con pocos materiales para su negocio y ahora con el préstamo solicitado podrá comprar los materiales que le hacen falta en su Cevicheria. Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP; está dispuesta a realizar sus pagos de forma puntual y pueda solicitar a otro crédito. En su banco comunal es una socia responsable y solidaria con sus compañeros. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, comprará platos, fuentes y todo lo necesario para su puesto de ventas.
texts.en:
Claudia is happy and tenacious. She is 40 years old. She is Alejandro’s wife, and he is 42 years old. They are the parents of two beautiful daughters, Tania who is 18 years old and Maydelin who is 8 years old. They live in their own home. Claudia is an optimistic woman and always thinking of her family. 

Some time ago she considered opening a ceviche stand in her neighborhood to offer a good service. She began fixing up her facility so that she could make a good appearance and attract the attention of people, and now, since then, she has the help of her husband and both are dedicated to giving her customers good service.

She is in her stand very early and people passing by always get to try the tasty rich ceviche with a drink. This is how Claudia attends to her customers and why people always return to Claudia’s Ceviche Stand.

At first she began with few supplies for her business and now with the loan she is requesting she will be able to buy some supplies that she lacks in her ceviche stand. This will be her sixth loan through MFP. She is ready to make her payments punctually in order to request another loan. She is a trustworthy member of her communal bank and united with her partners. With the 2,500 soles, she will buy plates and serving dishes and everything necessary for her food stand.

loans.use: to buy plates and serving dishes for her business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad, 35 years old and a single man, now lives with his mother after his father passed away. 

Mohammad has his own business which is a humble store selling all sorts of home products, whether it be for kitchen or for the living room or even decoration pieces. He now has applied for this loan to increase his profit by expanding and working on opening another store in a different area.

loans.use: to open another store in a different area

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab's husband has recently retired from the military, so they opened a small grocery store in their neighborhood where her husband and her brother work together. Now Zainab has applied for this loan to add more food products to the store to help her husband with his business.

Zainab is a 38-year-old married woman. She has five daughters and two sons. Zainab is a conservative person, she asked her brother, Mahmoud, to take her place in the photo.

loans.use: to add more food products to the store

loans.name: Tamer

texts.en:
Tamer is a 28-year-old married man. He has a son and a daughter.

Tamer owns a barber shop close to the market where he can attract a lot of people. The shop has been in existence for two years now; before that Tamer was working in the same field in another place where he got experience. He also took a few courses to learn more about men's hairstyles. Using his experience he has been able to manage his shop for two years now and been successful at it.

Now Tamer has applied for this loan for many reasons: renewing the shop’s registration, designing a new banner for the shop and doing some maintenance in the interior decoration.

loans.use: to renew the shop’s registration, design a new banner for the shop and do some maintenance in the interior decoration.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: Esperanza, de 41 años vive al lado de su esposo y sus 4 hijos en su casa propi, ubicada en la localidad de Chilca. Desde hace 7 años se dedica a la venta de artículos de arcilla como ollas, cocinas, jarrones, vasos y alcancías, etc. Viaja los fines de semana a otras ciudades aledañas a la suya para vender y los primeros días de la semana se abastece con nueva mercadería, siempre cuenta con la ayuda de una de sus hijas  en sus viajes, quien le ayuda a vender y en sus días libres  también realiza ventas de  medicinas naturales a sus vecinos. Con el transcurso del tiempo ha visto mejorar sus ingresos y  sostener su capital, que crece poco a poco, considera que su negocio es rentable  porque le genera buenas rentas y puede apoyar su negocio adicionando el ingreso que genera su esposo que labora como profesor. Es por esta razón que  desea incrementar su  capital de trabajo, para mejorar su mercadería y así tener más clientes. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “la florida” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollada, ya que obtiene la ayuda para progresar en su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le gusta trabajar en su asociación pues son personas responsables y solidarias. Esperanza de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más ollas de barro y animales de arcilla que sirve para el ahorro de dinero, eso le permitirá aumentar el capital de su negocio.
texts.en:
Esperanza, 41, lives with her husband and her four children in her own house, located in the town of Chilca.  For seven years she has worked selling clay objects such as pots, stoves, vases, glasses, piggy banks, etc.  She travels on the weekend to other neighboring cities to sell, and the first days of the week she stocks up on new merchandise.  On her trips, she always has the help of one of her daughters, who helps her sell.  On her days off she also makes sales, of natural medicines to her neighbors.

Over time she has seen her income improve and maintained her capital, which grows little by little.  She considers that her business is profitable because it generates good income for her and she can support her business by adding the income from her husband, who works as a professor.  It is for this reason that she wants to increase her working capital, to improve her merchandise and so have more customers.

She belongs to the La Florida solidarity group and this is her third loan with MFP, where she feels well developed because she gets help to make progress in her business.  For this reason she promises to be punctual with her payments.

In addition, she likes to work in her bank because the people are responsible and supportive.

If she receives her support Esperanza will invest the money requested in buying more clay pots and clay animals, which will help to save money.  This will allow her to increase her capital in her business.

loans.use: to buy clay pots and decorations.

loans.name: Olfat

texts.en:
Olfat is a conservative woman who asked her husband Hashem to take her place in the photo.

Olfat is a 23-year-old married lady whose husband Hashem works as a driver.  Olfat owns a beauty salon and has a small section for bridal dresses rental. She has applied for this loan in order to enhance the quality and the models of the dresses she has to increase her profitability. She wants to add new dresses with new models.

loans.use: to add new dresses with new models.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is 20 years old and married. Her husband is a mechanic and they have no children.

Rana want to use the time when she has no responsibilities for children to work and help in improving their living conditions. So she is starting a small retail business selling home products at home. She bought a few kitchen items and she wants to add more home products to have a variety in her collection. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to add more home products to her inventory

loans.name: Mervat

texts.en:
Mervat is a conservative person so she asked her sister Mona who works with her to take her place in the photo.
 
Mervat is 38 years old and single. Mervat is one of 12 brothers and sister in the family. A few of them have already gotten married. Mervat started almost 10 years ago a small business at home, taking care of kids during the day while their parents are at work. She bought some toys and beds and turned one of the rooms into a play area and another into a sleep area. She also got help from two of her sisters at that time.

After five years, Mervat was able to build a small kindergarten and separated the business from her home. She offered her sisters a chance to work with her since the business has expanded, so Mona took charge of the managerial issues of the kindergarten and her other sister works as a nanny there.

Each year, Mervat does some enhancement to the decoration or even buys new furniture. Now she has applied for a loan in order to start making a new section for a nursery and a section for the older kids to be able to prepare them for the school environment.

loans.use: To start making a new section fora  nursery in her kindergarten
